ygData.subject: Re: Getting my EQ fix any way I can (gee, this got real  long)
ygData.msgSnippet: Countess Bathory D Allatu wrote: Regarding Feign Death... ... The aggro leaves immediately.  However, if you are KOS with teh mob, they will attack again as
ygData.messageBody:
Countess Bathory D'Allatu wrote:

Regarding Feign Death...

> It seems to work pretty well in Guk. I went LD once
> and came back to my group being gone, a shaman, undead
> knight and some warrior who was hitting me for 80s. I
> finally got a Feign off and it worked even with them
> beating on me. It lasts forever as long as you just
> lay there. I believe the aggro eventually leaves the
> MOB, so you can theoretically, get up and walk away
> after they are out of sight. Try that one at your own
> risk though.

The aggro leaves immediately. However, if you are
KOS with teh mob, they will attack again as soon as you stand
up. Other mobs though, feign and stand right back up and
they will ignore you. Perfect for in-city assassination.
Kill them fast with HT, feign, and then get up and leave
like nothing had happened.

Xilith
